product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consist of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope. (FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: 4.5 mtr, speed: 1450 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor, application: hydrant system

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, centrifugal horizontal type, with gland packing capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories and complete set shall mounted on common base frame. The quoted rate shall include fixing of coupling, coupling guard and foudation bolts etc. Civil foundation will be client's scope.(FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 1450 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, mounting: common base frame, packing: gland packing, accessories: coupling, coupling guard, foundation bolts, application: hydrant system

The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor, application: sprinkler system

The pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories and complete set shall mounted on common base frame. The quoted rate shall include fixing of coupling, coupling guard and foudation bolts etc. Civil foundation will be client's scope.(FOR SPRINKLER SYSTEM)

product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, mounting: common base frame, packing: gland packing, accessories: coupling, coupling guard, foundation bolts, application: sprinkler system

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven standby pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with diesel engine of suitable HP with speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope.
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: 4.5 mtr, speed: 1500 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: diesel engine, coupling: diesel engine, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection,testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven stand by pump, centrifugal horizontal type with gland packing and capable  of delivering 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled to suitable HP of Diesel Engine radiator water cooled type having speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories including diesel engine control panel and complete set shall be mounted on common base frame.Other accessories viz Batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves etc to be supplied. The quoted rate shall include radiator water cooling piping(if required), coupling guard and other standard accessories, RCC foundation(as recommended by manufacturer) and foundation bolts, etc, complete ( civil foundation shall be client's scope).
product_entries.size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 1500 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: diesel engine, cooling: radiator water cooled, mounting: common base frame, packing: gland packing, accessories: diesel engine control panel, batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves, radiator water cooling piping, coupling guard, RCC foundation, foundation bolts

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,VERTICAL TURBINE type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC.

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,centrifugal horizontal type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall coupled to TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 2900 RPM with all accessories mounted on common base frame.
product_entries.size: capacity: 25 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, speed: 2900 RPM
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: drive: electric motor, coupling: TEFC motor, mounting: common base frame

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of compartmentalised common control panel for above pumps  as per technical specification attached with this tender document. All components shall be housed in a common cubicals made of 16 swg. M.S. sheet with required stiffners(if required). The panel shall be powder coated of approved colour both inside and out side. The panel shall have both bottom and top cable entry provisions and panel shall be mounted on pedestal of 300mm height.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: application: for above pumps, material: M.S.(mild steel) sheet, finish: powder coated, entry provisions: bottom and top cable entry, mounting: pedestal, construction: common cubicals, stiffners: as required

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, laying, testing & commissioning of FRLS, PVC outer sheath, steel armoured, aluminium / copper conductor, 1100 Volt Grade power cables with gland etc for above pumps. The cable shall be laid in tray / hume pipe / in trenches / on walls / floors etc as required. Cables laid out doors shall include the price of earth escavation providing brick and sand protection, refilling and compacting the earth.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: FRLS(fire retardant low smoke), sheath: PVC outer sheath, armouring: steel armoured, conductor: aluminium or copper, accessories: gland, laying: tray, hume pipe, trenches, walls, floors, outdoor protection: brick and sand protection, refilling, compacting

product_entries.full_product_description: GI earthing strips of 50mm x 6mm thick, strips shall run on floor / ceiling / walls, from pump to control panel with necessary accessories as required.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: GI(galvanized iron), application: from pump to control panel, accessories: as required

product_entries.full_product_description: 25 Sq.mm single core multistrand copper cable shall be run on floor / ceiling / walls, from the nearest earth bar to the pump control panel with necessary accessories as required.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: core: single, type: multistrand, material: copper, application: from nearest earth bar to pump control panel, accessories: as required

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply and installation of pressure gauge, 1/2 inch bottom entry, of suitable range with ball valves and other accessories.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: range: suitable, accessories: ball valves and other accessories, entry: bottom

The bowl assembly shall consist of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven standby pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consists of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with diesel engine of suitable HP with speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with engine. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope.

Supply, erection,testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven stand by pump, centrifugal horizontal type with gland packing and capable  of delivering 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled to suitable HP of Diesel Engine radiator water cooled type having speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories including diesel engine control panel and complete set shall be mounted on common base frame.Other accessories viz Batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves etc to be supplied. Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of electric motor driven Jockey Pump,VERTICAL TURBINE type capable to deliver 25 M3/HR at 105 MWC.

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of compartmentalised common control panel for above pumps  as per technical specification attached with this tender document. All components shall be housed in a common cubicals made of 16 swg. M.S. sheet with required stiffners(if required). The panel shall be powder coated of approved colour both inside and out side. The panel shall have both bottom and top cable entry provisions and panel shall be mounted on pedestal of 300mm height.

Supply, laying, testing & commissioning of FRLS, PVC outer sheath, steel armoured, aluminium / copper conductor, 1100 Volt Grade power cables with gland etc for above pumps. The cable shall be laid in tray / hume pipe / in trenches / on walls / floors etc as required. Cables laid out doors shall include the price of earth escavation providing brick and sand protection, refilling and compacting the earth.
GI earthing strips of 50mm x 6mm thick, strips shall run on floor / ceiling / walls, from pump to control panel with necessary accessories as required.
25 Sq.mm single core multistrand copper cable shall be run on floor / ceiling / walls, from the nearest earth bar to the pump control panel with necessary accessories as required.
Supply and installation of pressure gauge, 1/2 inch bottom entry, of suitable range with ball valves and other accessories.
Supply and installation of Pressure switches, SPDT type, of suitable range for pump sets with ball valves and other accessories.
